orders_detail_sorder_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itemCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{amount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemStockUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO st_out ( out_code, order_code, company_code, customer_code, reg_date, update_date, out_type, delete_status ) SELECT 'OUT_CODE' || ST_OUT_OUT_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, o.order_code, o.company_code, o.customer_code, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '저장', 'N' FROM orders o LEFT OUTER JOIN orders_detail od ON o.order_code = od.order_detail_code WHERE o.order_code = #{orderCode}

INSERT INTO st_out_detail ( out_code, sorder, item_code ) SELECT (SELECT out_code FROM st_out WHERE order_code = #{orderCode}),
(SELECT COALESCE(MAX(sorder), 0) + 1 FROM st_out_detail), o.item_code FROM orders_detail o INNER JOIN st_out so ON o.order_detail_code = so.order_code WHERE o.order_detail_code = #{orderCode}

INSERT INTO WO ( work_order_code, order_code, item_code, item_quantity, work_status, product_type, delete_status, reg_date, update_date ) SELECT 'WORK' || (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(work_order_code, 5))), 0) + 1 FROM wo), o.order_code, od.item_code, od.quantity, '저장', '일반', 'N', SYSDATE, SYSDATE
FROM orders o INNER JOIN orders_detail od ON o.order_code = od.order_detail_code WHERE o.order_code = #{orderCode}

SELECT o.order_code, od.item_code, i.item_name, i.item_type, od.quantity, o.receive_order_type, o.order_date, o.order_empid, o.order_status
FROM orders o
JOIN orders_detail od ON o.order_code = od.order_detail_code JOIN item i ON od.item_code = i.item_code WHERE o.receive_or_place = '수주' AND o.order_status = '확정' AND o.company_code = 'COMPANY1'

SELECT
bom.low_item_code, i.item_name, i.item_type, i.stock_unit, wsd.good_quantity, wo.work_order_code, wd.work_order_quantity
FROM orders o JOIN orders_detail od ON o.order_code = od.order_detail_code JOIN bom ON od.item_code = bom.high_item_code JOIN item i ON bom.low_item_code = i.item_code JOIN wh_stock_detail wsd ON bom.low_item_code = wsd.item_code JOIN wo ON o.order_code = wo.order_code JOIN wo_detail wd ON wo.work_order_code = wd.work_order_code
WHERE o.order_code = #{orderCode}
